<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Register</title>
    <!-- External CSS link -->
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: left;
            align-items: center;
            height: 100vh;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background-color: #f5f5f5; /* Light grey background */
        }

        .register-container {
            background-color:#95a5a6; /* White background for the form */
            padding: 30px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0px 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); /* Subtle shadow for depth */
            width: 400px;
            margin-left: 14%; /* Moves the container slightly to the right */
        }

        .register-container h1 {
            font-size: 26px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #082c32; /* Dark blue-grey text */
            margin-bottom: 25px;
        }

        .register-container h1 span {
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 30px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            color: #114d57; /* Fresh green for highlight */
        }

        form {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        form label {
            font-size: 16px;
            color: #10151a; /* Slightly darker grey for labels */
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        form input {
            padding: 12px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            border: 1px solid #27ae60; /* Fresh green border */
            border-radius: 5px;
            background-color: rgb(234, 227, 227); /* Light grey input background */
            color: #2c3e50; /* Dark text for better readability */
            font-size: 16px;
        }

        form input::placeholder {
            color: #95a5a6; /* Soft grey for placeholder text */
        }

        button {
            padding: 12px;
            background-color: #e74c3c; /* Vibrant red for the button */
            color: #ffffff; /* White text */
            border: none;
            border-radius: 5px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
        }

        button:hover {
            background-color: #c0392b; /* Darker red on hover */
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="register-container">
        <h1>Fill up your plate by <span>REGISTERING</span></h1>
        <body style="background-image: url('data:image/jpeg;base64,'); background-size: cover; background-position: center;"></body>
        <form action="/register" method="POST">
            <label for="name"><b>Name:</b></label>
            <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>

            <label for="email"><b>Email:</b></label>
            <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>

            <label for="phone"><b>Phone Number:</b></label>
            <input type="text" id="phone" name="phone" required>

            <label for="password"><b>Password:</b></label>
            <input type="password" id="password" name="password" required>

            <label for="confirm-password"><b>Confirm Password:</b></label>
            <input type="password" id="confirm-password" name="confirm-password" required>

            <button type="submit">Register</button>
        </form>
    </div>
</body>

</html>
